goal.en: “The purpose of this course is to learn basic theories, computations and applications of ordinary differential equations.“
goal.ch: “學習微分方程的基本原理, 計算及應用“

content.en: “(Prerequisite: MA2041) Continuation of MA2041. The Laplace transform, system of first order linear equations, nonlinear differential equations and stability, partial differential equations: wave equations, heat equations, Laplace equation and related Topics: Fourier series and Fourier transform and their applications.“
